data.title: SABRE Awards Latin America 2024 Finalists
data.meta_description: Finalists for the 2024 Latin America SABRE Awards, taking in Brazil on 24 September.
data.text:
The 2024 SABRE Awards Latin America shortlist recognizes Superior Achievement in Branding, Reputation and Engagement. The campaigns were evaluated by a jury of more than 25 industry leaders.

The winners will be announced at our annual Latin American SABRE Awards event, which will take place in Sao Paulo, Brazil, at the Tivoli Mofarrej SÃ£o Paulo Hotel on September 24, in partnership with Brazilian trade association ABRACOM. Tickets for the event are available to purchase on the dedicated event site.
